Field notes. Both species of
Eutolmus
are widespread in South Korea and occupy sympatric and allopatric habitats. In addition, there is a seasonal overlap.

Eutolmus koreanus Hradsk
ý
&
Hüttinger, 1985
(
Fig 17
)

Eutolmus koreanus
Hradskÿ & Hüttinger 1985
—
Hradskÿ & Hüttinger ( 1985 : 170 )
.

Similar to
E. brevistylus
except: Legs: Femora black with yellow and black hair and black bristles; anterior femur with long black and yellow ventral hair; tibia black with yellow and black hair and black bristles.
